content.shortPara: In Q&A competition held on Mar 19th, Academians showed all they know about various categories of questions and presented an extremely fierce battle...

content.shortPara: How was your this year? Hope you enjoyed a lot in JCAC✨ Now you can check our HALL YEAR BOOK!Check out our Hall Year Book now!
content.title: Hall Year Book 2019

contentForEvent.para: PEK Aquatic Meeting was held in CityU swimming pool on Oct 6th. Academians were all in red T-shirts, proudly cheering for our 12 swimmers...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Aquatic Meet

contentForEvent.para: PEK Athletic Competition was held JointSports Center on Oct 14th. Academians got together there cheering for our runners. At the sound of the gun, the first runner shot from the starting point...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Athletic Meet

contentForEvent.para: On the evening of November 1st with the cool Autumn wind, residents of Hall 4 gathered together at Multi-function HallB, participating in Meet-And-Chat Night hold by SRO and Hall 4...
contentForEvent.title: Meet-And-Chat Night

contentForEvent.para: On Nov. 14th, the expected High Table Dinner was held by JCAC Resident Association. Themed as “little prince”, the High Table Dinner was decorated magnificently and tidily. All participants were in formal suit, graceful and elegant...
contentForEvent.title: High Table Dinner

contentForEvent.para: On Oct. 18th, the third round of PEK tennis match (Hall4 vs. Hall10) was held in Joint SportsCentre. Academians were all in red hall-T, standing together and aiming for the victory...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Tennis

contentForEvent.para: On Nov 17th, PEK soccer semi-final (Hall4 vs. Hall2) got its opening at Joint Sports Centre.Taking with triple-game wins, JCAC soccer team was full of confidence, while our Academians got together there to cheer for our players...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Soccer

contentForEvent.para: Co-organised by the Student Residence Office (SRO) and Jockey Club Academy Hall (Hall 4), you are invited to join the Silent Sky Project# by Dutch Visual Artist Mr. Rob Sweere (Project initiated by an inbound exchange student)...
contentForEvent.title: Silent Sky

contentForEvent.para: Bathed in warm sunlight and feeling cool wind, Academians left for Cheung Chau Island with happiness and comfort...
contentForEvent.title: Integration Trip

contentForEvent.para: The new semester is coming with the new year ring of 2019. From now on, our JCAC public account will be accompanying with you to experience and expect every excellent moment of Semester B...
contentForEvent.title: Global Tea Reception

contentForEvent.para: With the theme of “full of happiness” and various cartoon characters decorations, the activity venue was bustling with laugh and excitement...
contentForEvent.title: Funfair

contentForEvent.para: In the charge of JCAC Resident Association, Dodgeball Competition was held at Outdoor Basketball Court on Feb 22nd...
contentForEvent.title: Dodgeball

contentForEvent.para: PEK Basketball Competition Women’s final took place at Outdoor Basketball Court on Feb 24th. With encouragement from our cheering team, JCAC Women’s basketball team was fully confident and prepared to battle against Hall 7...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Basketball

contentForEvent.para: PEK Table Tennis Tournament quarter-finals got started on Mar 1st. JCAC Table Tennis Team was expected to defeat Hall 3 and enter the semi-finals after the previous victory...
contentForEvent.title: PEK Table Tennis

contentForEvent.para: Spring wind softly blowing and warm sunshine flooding on the earth, Ngong Ping Cultural Trip was successfully held by JCAC Resident Association...
contentForEvent.title: Cultural Trip - Ngong Ping

contentForEvent.para: 靜思少年往事，平實質樸的一切彷彿都歷歷在目。那種看不見摸不著的淳樸誠懇，正是紛繁複雜的當下所缺少的至寶。。。
contentForEvent.title: 記得早先少年時 ACANOVA - Singing Contest

contentForEvent.para: In Q&A competition held on Mar 19th, Academians showed all they know about various categories of questions and presented an extremely fierce battle. Every participant was like an alive encyclopedia!...
contentForEvent.title: Q&A Competition

contentForEvent.para: A variety of foods such as chicken, fish, and prawn are cooked in one large basin, which makes up the traditional Cantonese cuisine originating in New Territories, Hong Kong...
contentForEvent.title: Poon Choi Feast

contentForEvent.para: Career Carnival is held on 26th March co-organized together with Student Residence Office (SR) and Jockey Club Academy Hall (Hall 4)!...
contentForEvent.title: Career Carnival

contentForEvent.para: How was your this year? Hope you enjoyed a lot in JCAC✨ Now you can check our HALL YEAR BOOK! Please click the link below and check whether you are in the photos or not!!Check out our Hall Year Book now!
contentForEvent.title: Hall Year Book 2019

contentForEvent.para: As the semester ended, take a break and look back at what we have achieved in Hall 4. The year was long, not always pleasant, but the company of fellow residents has made our life better. All residents are part of the bigger Hall 4 family. Feel free to take a look of 2019/20 Hall Book from the link below.
contentForEvent.title: Hall Year Book 2020

content.shortPara: What? You don’t know how’s the hall life in Hall 4? Click here to check it out!
content.title: Colourful Hall Life

content.title: Hall Rules

content.title: Life in Hall 4
